<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_data_broker_transform"><sys_ux_data_broker_transform action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><acl_failure_result/><api_name>x_708650_pfm.Request Item Data Broker</api_name><description>Data broker that returns the request itemfrom the request</description><mutates_server_data>false</mutates_server_data><name>Request Item Data Broker</name><output_schema/><private>false</private><props>[
  {
    "name": "sysId",
    "label": "Sys Id",
    "fieldType": "string",
    "valueType": "object",
    "readOnly": false,
    "mandatory": true,
    "description": "Sys Id of sc_request table"
  }
]</props><required_translations>[{"message":"Sys Id of sc_request table","comment":""},{"message":"Sys Id","comment":""}]</required_translations><schema_version>1.0.0</schema_version><script><![CDATA[function transform(input) {
    var requestSysId = input.sysId || "";
    if (requestSysId !== "") {
        var request = new GlideRecord("sc_req_item");
        request.addQuery('request', requestSysId);
        request.query();
        if (request.next()) {
            return {
				"table" : "sc_req_item",
				"sysId" : request.getUniqueValue(),
				"number" : request.getValue("number")
			};
        }
    }
    return;
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-06-03 17:29:31</sys_created_on><sys_id>5f6f6fa604f74110adb6e4cd9ec20c1b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Request Item Data Broker</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PFM" source="x_708650_pfm">756d8d432f83301036b3d6c6f699b681</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PFM">756d8d432f83301036b3d6c6f699b681</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform_5f6f6fa604f74110adb6e4cd9ec20c1b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-06-03 17:29:31</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_data_broker_transform></record_update>
